alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 15 at 3:46PM HST until November 16 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI AND OAHU... .A building northwest swell (320 degrees) will produce advisory level surf along north and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai and Oahu this evening through Wednesday afternoon. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai and Oahu. * WHERE...Niihau, Kauai Southwest, Waianae Coast, Oahu North Shore, Olomana, Kauai North and Koolau Windward. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Coast
